name: Advanced Rock Paper Scissors
description:
Are you ready for the greatest sport the world has ever seen?

It’s Advanced Rock Paper Scissors and it’s always been your dream!

ARPS mixes the classic simplicity of Rock Paper Scissors with the skill and mind games of the fighting genre. You'll need fast reflexes, clever plays, and smart use of "cancels" and "reversals" if you hope crush your opponents beneath your fists.

This is a 2-player hand-to-hand battle., but you'll both share one controller! (the controller is required. The game won't work without it)

Is THE WORLD ready for ADVANCED ROCK PAPER SCISSORS?

Advanced Rock Paper Scissors was created by Nick Kornek

With music by Brennan Neve
